prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Drums, Organ, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Organ, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Organ, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
